SELECT ROWNUM RN , T1.SPR_ID AS SPR_ID , T1.MMR_ID AS MMR_ID , T1.MMR_NM AS MMR_NM , T1.MMR_DTM AS MMR_DTM , T1.USR_ID AS MMR_USR_ID , T1.USR_NM AS MMR_USR_NM , T1.USR_IMG_ID AS MMR_USR_IMG_ID , Y.SPR_NM AS SPR_NM FROM ( SELECT A.SPR_ID AS SPR_ID , A.MMR_ID AS MMR_ID , A.MMR_NM AS MMR_NM , A.MMR_DESC AS MMR_DESC , TO_CHAR(A.MMR_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MMR_DTM , A.USR_ID AS USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.USR_ID, '1') AS USR_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.USR_ID, '6') AS USR_IMG_ID FROM SPR2100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.SPR_ID = #sprId# ORDER BY A.MMR_ID DESC ) T1 LEFT JOIN SPR1000 Y ON T1.SPR_ID = Y.SPR_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.MMR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.MMR_DESC, '<[^>]*>', '') LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.USR_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND TO_CHAR(T1.MMR_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(#searchStartDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_CHAR(T1.MMR_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(#searchEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ASC
ORDER BY RN DESC

SELECT A.SPR_ID AS SPR_ID , B.SPR_NM AS SPR_NM , A.MMR_ID AS MMR_ID , A.MMR_NM AS MMR_NM , A.MMR_DESC AS MMR_DESC , TO_CHAR(A.MMR_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MMR_DTM , A.USR_ID AS USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.USR_ID, '1') AS USR_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.USR_ID, '6') AS USR_IMG_ID FROM SPR2100 A LEFT JOIN SPR1000 B ON A.SPR_ID = B.SPR_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.SPR_ID = #sprId# AND A.MMR_ID = #mmrId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_MMR_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_MMR_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'MMR' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_MMR_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(MMR_ID) AS NEW_MMR_ID FROM SPR2100 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.SPR_ID = #sprId# AND A.MMR_ID LIKE 'MMR' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO SPR2100 ( LIC_GRP_ID, PRJ_GRP_ID, PRJ_ID ,SPR_ID, MMR_ID, MMR_NM ,MMR_DESC, MMR_DTM, USR_ID ,REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP ,MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId#, #prjGrpId#, #prjId# ,#sprId#, #newMmrId#, #mmrNm# ,#mmrDesc#, SYSDATE, #mmrUsrId# ,SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,SYSDATE, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SPR2100 A SET MMR_NM = #mmrNm# ,MMR_DESC = #mmrDesc# ,MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE ,MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# ,MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.SPR_ID = #sprId# AND A.MMR_ID = #mmrId#
